thread.section_title: BIGWORDS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BIGWORDS.com | bigwords.com
thread.title: Nick G

author: Nick G
title: Nick G
text: I've been using Bigwords.com for a few years now and have saved hundreds and hundreds of dollars. I've told lots of friends and classmates over the years to do the same. I usually spend about $100 per semester on all of my books using this site. Seriously, Bigwords is a fricking amazing service that has been a godsend for a perpetually broke college student like myself. Keep up the good work!
